com.ooyala.android.item

Class ContentItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.item.ContentItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizableItem, OrderedMapValue<java.lang.String>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Channel, ChannelSet, Video

    public abstract class ContentItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthorizableItem, OrderedMapValue<java.lang.String>
    Stores the info and metadata for the specified content item.
